job_tasks.phrase: Na een succesvolle afronding heb jij als AI Engineer de kennis en kunde om AI-systemen te ontwerpen, ontwikkelen en onderhouden.
job_tasks.justification: This phrase directly describes the core software engineering tasks of designing, developing, and maintaining AI systems, which aligns with the definition of building and deploying software applications.
The explicit mention of 'MLOps' falls directly under the category of building and managing infrastructure and pipelines for ML/GenAI systems.
DevOps and Version Control (Git) are key components of managing and maintaining software systems, aligning with the MLOps category's focus on CI/CD and system reliability.
CI/CD practices, along with specific tools like Docker, Kubernetes, and Linux, are fundamental to the operations and deployment of software, fitting the MLOps definition.

job_tasks.phrase: Specialisatie in: Deep Learning, Computer Vision, Generative AI (LLM)
job_tasks.justification: The specialization in Deep Learning, Computer Vision, and Generative AI (LLM) directly relates to the core process of creating, training, and adapting machine learning models.

soft_skills.phrase: wil je je graag verder ontwikkelen? Dan bieden wij jou de unieke kans om in een Fast Track van zes weken uit te groeien tot een expert op het gebied van Artificial Intelligence
Na dit opleidingsprogramma beschik je over de volgende vaardigheden en kennis

profile.rationale: The job ad explicitly mentions a 'Fast Track' program to become an AI expert, covering both foundational software engineering skills (Python, Cloud, MLOps, DevOps, CI/CD) and AI specialization (Deep Learning, Computer Vision, Generative AI/LLM). The emphasis on designing, developing, and maintaining AI systems, combined with the specific mention of Generative AI (LLM) as a specialization, indicates a balanced mix of Macro-Category A and B tasks with a focus on GenAI, fitting the 'Core GenAI Engineer' profile.

confidence.reasoning: The job ad is very clear about the skills and knowledge gained through the 'Fast Track' program, explicitly listing both software engineering and AI specialization areas. The mention of Generative AI (LLM) as a specialization, alongside the core engineering tasks, makes the profile assignment straightforward.
